title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

General Considerations

The response must accurately describe the data.

For Task A, the response must identify the generation that is projected to have the lowest percentage of eligible voters in 2028, as shown in the bar graph.

For Task B, the response must correctly describe the trend over time in the data, as shown in the bar graph.

For Task C, the response must correctly draw a conclusion about how a trend in the data could affect a 2032 presidential candidate’s strategy to mobilize eligible voters.

For Task D, the response must correctly explain how life cycle effects, as shown in the bar graph, could influence a candidate’s policy platform.

The point for each criterion is earned independently.
descriptions: The response accomplishes none of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the prompt.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the prompt.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the prompt.
The response accomplishes four of the tasks set by the prompt.
